LanguageData.VRE_Hemohunter.label: hemohunter
LanguageData.VRE_Hemohunter.beginLetter: {0} has become a hemohunter! \n\n[PAWN_pronoun] will drain hemogen off of anyone [PAWN_pronoun] sees, until their hemogen rises to a safe level.
LanguageData.VRE_Hemohunter.recoveryMessage: {0}'s hemohunter state has come to an end.
